title: Digital Certificates Blockchain Receipt Schema, Version 1.2.0
description: Digital Certificates Blockchain Receipt Schema, Version 1.2.0: uses the chainpoint v2 standard for providing receipts of blockchain transactions

JsonLdType.description: A type or an array of types that the digital-certificates object represents. The first or only item should be 'issuer', and any others should each be an IRI (usually a URL) corresponding to a definition of the type itself. In almost all cases, there will be only one type: 'issuer'

merkleRoot.description: Merkle root value -- this is anchored to the blockchain

proof.description: how to walk the Merkle tree from the target item to the Merkle root

left.description: value of left neighbor to combine into parent hash

right.description: value of right neighbor to combine into parent hash

anchors.description: how the proof is anchored to the blockchain

sourceId.description: where to locate proof, e.g. transaction id
